sdo:itemDesc.dc:title: Handwritten letter from Schenker to the Akademie für Musik, dated December 17, 1926
sdo:itemDesc.dc:description: Schenker inquires whether interest on the capital will be available for him to award the Sofie Deutsch stipend in 1927.

tei:address.tei:addrLine: der Akademie für Musik u. darstellende Kunst!Writing of this letter is recorded in Schenker's diary at OJ 3/9, p. 3012, October 17, 1926: An die Akademie (Br.): ob das Stipendium am 6. I. 27 zur Auszahlung gelangen kann?" ("To the Academy (letter): Whether the stipend can be paid out on January 6, 1927?"). — A draft in Jeanette Schenker's hand is preserved as OJ 5/4, [2], the variants in which which are given here in footnotes. — In OJ 5/4, [2], Schenker has written in the left margin "1.27 zu haben?" ("to have in January 1927?"), and the date, "17.XII.26" is placed above the naming of the addressee.

tei:div.tei:p: Im Sinne der am 21. 10 25 u. 30. 10. 25 getauschten"von uns" ("by us") in OJ 5/4, [2]. Schreiben= OJ 9/1, [1] and UMdK Z 641 D/1925, [1]. erlaube ich mir anzufragen, ob ich zum 6. 1. 27 als dem Todestag der Stifterin Frau Sophie DeutschThe correct death date was January 5. The 1927 award would mark the tenth anniversary of the stipend, albeit it had not been awarded in every single year between 1918 and 1926. in der Lage sein werde, die Zinsen des angelegten Kapitals für dieses Jahr u. die vergangenen Jahre verteilen zu können.
Für Ihre freundliche Mühe bestens dankend zeichne ich mit dem Ausdruck vorzüglicher HochachtungNo paragraph break in OJ 5/4, [2], and the sentence is preceded by "Im Voraus," (In advance").

tei:addrLine.tei:rs: Academy for Music and Performing Art

tei:div.tei:p: In connection with the letters exchanged on October 21, 1925 and October 30, 1925, I take the liberty of inquiring whether I shall be in a position on January 6, 1927, the death date of the foundress, Mrs Sophie Deutsch, to be able to distribute the interest on the invested capital for this year and past years.
Thanking you cordially for your kind attention, I sign with expression of kind regards,
